name: Centipete
description:
My first game and my entry for the #MyFirstGameJam.

Collect friends and follow the color pattern.

Controls (can be changed in the Options):

‘W’, ‘A’, ‘S’, ‘D’ to move 

‘R’ to say bye to all the passive NPCs

‘K’ to say bye to your last follower

Collect the NPCs in the correct order shown in the pattern above and make it through the finishing line.
